title: LIYAXUN 100" x 84" Luxury European Style Jacquard Silky Heavy Fabric Curtain, Grommet Top Lining Blackout Drapes with Multi Size Custom for Window Decor, Gold with Liner 100" W x 84" L (One Panel)
features: 【FABRIC & PERFORMANCE】- These soft and durable Luxury European Style Jacquard Curtains are all Triple Weave Fabric, made by innovative technology specially yarn. High performance on Thermal Insulated, Blackout, Noise Reducing, Energy Saving / Efficiency and Privacy Protection.
【WHAT'S IN THE PACKAGE】- Package includes One Panel of Gold Jacquard Floral Patterned Curtain (Add Chocolate Lining) with Grommet Top, Each Panel measures 100 Inches Wide by 84 Inches Long.

【GROMMET CONSTRUCTION】- Each Grommet has 1.6-inch Inner Diameter, easy to hang and slide smoothly. 100% Stainless Steel. Hand-Made Products, Size Error Range 1 inch. ==Grommets Quantity== : 30" W (4), 42" W (6), 50" W (8), 72" W (10), 84" W (12), 100" W (14)
【COLOR DIFFERENCE】- Color May Vary Slightly from Depiction because of Lighting, Monitor and Dyelot Chromatism. It is recommended to order in pairs to avoid color differences!

【CUSTOMIZATION SUPPORTED】- All Curtains can be Customized to be any Size, Top Construction or add Lining if you could CONTACT US via E-MAIL in advance. Custom Order is NOT Available to 30-Days Return Policy, please note!
description: Luxury European Style Jacquard Silky Heavy Fabric Curtain

blackout curtains are the perfect addition to your home -- Reduce Outside Noise and Enjoy a Quiet and Peaceful Environment - Save on Home Heating and Cooling Costs.Our thermal insulated curtains are available in a variety of sizes and rich colors. These block out curtains are following the modern minimalism style, suitable for the bedroom, living room, dining room, infant room, kids room, office or other public place.
